General_review: Pinkberry is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Frozen Yogurt, Ice Cream that delivers across Abu Ftaira, Abu Hasaniya, Adailiya, Adan and Al Masayel.

Their best selling dishes are Small with Toppings, Medium with Toppings, Large with Toppings and Small without Toppings, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Frozen Yogurt, Ice Cream.
They have been reviewed 7367 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Hot Beverages.description: Savor the delicate aroma and taste of our premium green tea, expertly harvested and processed to preserve their natural antioxidants and health benefits.

Hot Beverages.name: Mint Tea
Hot Beverages.description: Experience the refreshing and invigorating delight of our Mint Tea, a soothing infusion of aromatic mint leaves, creating a cool and revitalizing beverage that will invigorate your senses with each sip.

Hot Beverages.name: Lemon Tea
Hot Beverages.description: Indulge in the refreshing harmony of zesty citrus and soothing warmth with our invigorating Lemon Tea, a blissful infusion that will rejuvenate your senses with every sip.

Hot Beverages.name: Milk
Hot Beverages.description: Indulge in the creamy delight of our luscious Milk, sourced from the finest dairy farms for a velvety smoothness and wholesome goodness.

Hot Beverages.name: Nescafe
Hot Beverages.description: Experience the bold and rich flavor of premium Arabica beans in our convenient Nescafe, made with a special blend of coffee for a quick and delicious pick-me-up.

General_review: Byalat Karak is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Breakfast, Pastries, Indian that delivers across Jahra - Jahra Area, Sabah Al-Salem, Sharq and Sharq.

Their best selling dishes are Chapati Halloumi, Chapati Kraft And Oman Fries , Chapati Shakshoka and Chapati Fried Eggs, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Pastries, Indian.
They have been reviewed 88212 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.
